head -40 /etc/logrotate.d/mysql
/var/log/mysql/mysql.log /var/log/mysql/mysql.log /var/log/mysql/mysql.err /var/log/mysql/mysql-slow.log {
    daily
    rotate 7
    missingok
    create 640 mysql adm
    size 100M
    compress
    delaycompress
    notifempty
    sharedscripts
    postrotate
        test -x /usr/bin/mysqladmin || exit 0
        if mysqladmin ping > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            mysqladmin flush-logs
        fi
    endscript
}

import socket
